name: Will you Run?
description:
This game is a parkour inspired by Karlson but with no wallrunning or other complicated  stuffs like grappling gun because i want the game to be simple and enjoyable.

tips:

you can move with w,a,s,d and if you have a gaming keyboard you can use fn+z to switch from w,a,s,d to z,q,s,d.

use the Button Esc to return to the MainMenu.

click the left MouseButton to Hide the cursor.

Download instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on your desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • and enjoy the game
 Challenge
  • try to finish the game as soon as you can and send me your speedrun in insta : ezzir-dev
Music

Music from the Unity Assest Store name of the Assest  : Action Soundtrack MP3 Edition Lite this assest by MUZ STATION PRODUCTIONS thanks to his cool free soundtracks
